text: 3A is a German pop band consisting of brothers Aaron, Abel, and Adam Lovac. == Band history == The Lovac brothers were discovered in Nieukerk, Germany, when they were between the ages of only 11 to 13 years old. In 2010, they published their first album titled Teenage Queen.Die Lovac Brüder, Mike Wilbury, Classic Rocks This led to their discovery by German producer Peter Hoffmann and a record deal with the major label Sony Music. At first, the band was known as LaLaLa, however they changed their name to 3A before the publication of their next album, #wirsindhier. In 2013 they were included in the opening act for Tyler Ward's 11 concerts in Germany.3A: die Newcomerband aus Nieukerk , Niederrhein Nachrichten, 4. February 2014Hände hoch für den Hype!, Alex Miebach, Express, 26. November 2013 In February 2014, the band released their first single, Sind Wir Freunde?, which reached 81 on the German singles chart.Chartquellen: Chartdiskografie Deutschland (Details) Their album #wirsindhier appeared with some delay in April of that year and also reached the 85th spot on the chart. In May 2016 Lina Larissa Strahl published her album Official, as a part of which band member Aaron Lovac accompanies Strahl for the song Mädchen liebt das Feuer. ==Band members== * Aaron Lovac, , Singer and Drummer3A: Wir stellen dir die Band vor, Bravo, Published 5 August 2014 * Abel Lovac, , Singer and Guitarist * Adam Lovac, , Singer and Bassist == Discography == Albums * Teenage Queen (2010) * #wirsindhier (2014) Songs * Sind wir Freunde? (2014) * Parallel (2014) == References == Category:German pop music groups Category:German boy bands
title: 3A (band)
